channel.title: Bookmark markdown URLs to DEVONthink
channel.description: Hi, I created a drafts Action to Add markdown formatted Urls "[title](url)" to DEVONthink / DTTG as a bookmark. It will scan the current draft for all available markdown links and prompt you to select the one you want to bookmark. If there is only one url in the draft, it will be used directly without a prompt. Download here: https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/18n

item.title: Bookmark markdown URLs to DEVONthink
item.dc:creator: NotPowerUser
item.description:
Thank you! it works now

Read full topic

item.title: Bookmark markdown URLs to DEVONthink
item.dc:creator: NotPowerUser
item.description:
I tried on different drafts, so don’t think it is something wrong with drafts itself.

Here is example I used today:

# Test

[Bookmark markdown URLs to DEVONthink - Actions - Share What You've Made - Drafts Community](https://forums.getdrafts.com/t/bookmark-markdown-urls-to-devonthink/7442/4)

After I run the action, DEVONthink opens and nothing more. Few minutes later (maybe 2-3) I get error from Drafts: Failed
Message is: undefined, Script step completed.

DraftsVersion 26.1.5
DEVONthink Version 3.6.3 Pro

I haven’t tried this action on iOS because I do mostly my clean up in Drafts inbox from a MacBook.

Read full topic

Which version of DTTG/DT are you running?
And are you talking about running the action on the mac or iOS?

item.title: Bookmark markdown URLs to DEVONthink
item.dc:creator: FlohGro
item.description:
Hi,
I created a drafts Action to Add markdown formatted Urls “title” to DEVONthink / DTTG as a bookmark.
It will scan the current draft for all available markdown links and prompt you to select the one you want to bookmark.
If there is only one url in the draft, it will be used directly without a prompt.
Download here: https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/18n

Read full topic
